column2: "Nna asaase no do ɔman no faa Josia ne babanyin Jehoahaz
column3: na wɔhyɛɛ no hen wɔ n’egya n’ananmu wɔ Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Aber a Jehoahaz hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe eduonu ebiasa: na odzii hen abosoom ebiasa wɔ Jerusalɛm."
"Na Egypthen no tuu no adze do wɔ Jerusalɛm
column3: na odzii asaase no ɔsakaw gyee dwetɛ  talent   ɔha na sika  talent ."

column2: "Na Egypthen no dze Jehoahaz no nua Eliakim hyɛɛ hen wɔ Juda na Jerusalɛm do
column3: na ɔdaan ne dzin Jehoiakim. Na Neko faa Jehoahaz

column2: "Aber a Jehoiakim hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe eduonu enum; na odzii hen mfe dubiako wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn enyi do."
"Ɔno na Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar fowee baa no do
"Nebukadenezar dze EWURADZE ne fie ndzɛmba no bi so kɔr Babilɔn
column3: na ɔdze kesisii n’asɔrdan mu wɔ Babilɔn."

column2: "Afei Jehoiakim no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column4: na dza wohun no wɔ mu no
column6: wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Israel na Juda ahemfo nwoma no mu: na ne babanyin Jehoiakin dzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."

column2: "Aber a Jehoiakin hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe awɔtwe; na odzii hen abosoom ebiasa na dadu wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do."
"Na n’afedan no
column3: ɔhen Nebukadenezar somae ma wɔkɛfaa no kɔr Babilɔn
column4: ka EWURADZE ne fie ndzɛmba fɛɛfɛw no ho
column5: na ɔhyɛɛ no nua Zedekia ɔhen wɔ Juda na Jerusalɛm do."

column2: "Aber a Zedekia hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe eduonu biako; na odzii hen mfe dubiako wɔ Jerusalɛm
column4: "na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE ne Nyankopɔn enyi do; ɔammbrɛ noho adze wɔ nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia a ɔkasaa EWURADZE ano no enyim."

column2: "Na ɔno so ɔtseew etua wɔ ɔhen Nebukadenezar a ɔmaa ɔdze Nyankopɔn kaa ntam no no do: na mbom ɔkyee no kɔn
"Nkyii so asɔfo no mu etsitsir nyinara
column4: foom kɛsenara dɛ mbrɛ wiadze ekyiwadze no tsetsee; na woguu EWURADZE ne fi no a ɔayɛ no krɔnkrɔn wɔ Jerusalɛm no ho fi."

column2: "Na EWURADZE
column4: nam n’abɔfoe do somae ma wɔbaa hɔn nkyɛn
column5: ɔsoɛɛr ahanamakye na ɔsomae; osiandɛ ohun ne man

column2: "naaso hɔn dze
column4: na wobuu ne nsɛm no enyimtsia
column6: kodur dɛ EWURADZE n’ebufuhyew no soɛree wɔ ne man do
column7: kodur dɛ ɔyarsa nnyi hɔ bio."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na ɔdze Kaldeafo hen no baa hɔn do
column3: ɔno na ɔdze afona kunkum hɔn mberantsɛ wɔ hɔn krɔnkrɔnbea ofi no mu
column4: na woennya ayamuhyehye wɔ aberantsɛ anaa akataasia
column5: akɔdaa anaa ɔtsetsenyi ho: ɔdze hɔn nyinara hyɛɛ ne nsa."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn fie ndzɛmba no nyinara
column6: na n’asafohemfo akoradze no; iyinom nyinara ɔdze baa Babilɔn."

column2: "Na wɔhyeew Nyankopɔn ne fi no
column4: na wɔdze ogya hyeew no mu aban no nyinara
column5: na wɔsɛɛ no mu ndzɛmba fɛɛfɛw no nyinara."

column2: "Na hɔn a wofii afona anomu guanee no
column3: ɔsosoo hɔn kɔr Babilɔn; na wɔkɛyɛɛ nkowaa maa ɔno na ne mba araa dze kodur Persia ahendzi ber no:"

column2: "ama wɔdze aama EWURADZE n’asɛm a ɔnam Jeremia anomu no ahyɛ ma
column3: ekodu dɛ asaase no benya n’ahomgyenda no edzi: na mber tsentsen a ɔda hɔ amamfo no nna n’ahomgyeda no dze ewie mfe eduosuon dzi."

column2: "Afei Persiahen Sirus n’afe a odzi kan mu no
column3: mbrɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm a ofi Jeremia n’anomu no bɛba mu ntsi
column4: nna EWURADZE bɔɔ Persiahen Sirus no sunsum nkenyan
column5: ma ɔmaa wɔkɔbɔɔ dawur dze kyiin n’ahenman nyinara mu
column10: Asaase do ahendzi nyinara nna EWURADZE
column12: ɔdze ama me; na ɔnoara na ɔdze ahyɛ me dɛ minsi no ofi wɔ Jerusalɛm a ɔwɔ Juda no. Obiara a ɔwɔ hom mu a ofi ne man nyinara mu no
